key.name: ior
key.description: Snell's law IOR for the glass dome (1.0 = no refraction, 2.0 = heavy)

key.name: chromatic-aberration
key.description: Per-channel IOR offset producing color fringing at edges

key.name: distortion
key.description: Overall displacement magnitude for refracted rays

key.name: corner-radius
key.description: Rounded-rect corner radius of the glass shape (pixels)

key.name: fresnel
key.description: Strength of the bright rim caused by Fresnel reflection

key.name: blur
key.description: Gaussian blur radius applied to the refracted background

key.name: tint-color
key.description: RGBA hex color for the glass tint overlay

key.name: apply-to-panel
key.description: Whether to apply the liquid glass effect to the top panel
